general.description: The surface of Kramer is mostly water, so it has a significantly lower population than its sister world, Griffin III. However, the food and rare compounds from the vast oceans make the planet nearly as rich as its compatriot.
general.bar: This underwater bar is quite the spectacle. Large marine creatures swim by the windows, and the main lobby is designed to enhance the aesthetic. A little overdone, but the natural beauty more than makes up for it.
